name: The Chronomonicron
description:
Welcome to The Chrononomicron: A Tale of Time and Madness

Lewis Carol has been having headaches recently and they seem to be getting worse! As a result of the Migraine Auras, Lewis set's off on a walk around London town to try and clear his head. Lewis wanders around trying to clear his head by taking in the sights and sounds of his beloved London but soon realizes as he pulls out his fob watch to check on the time he realizes that he is late for a very important date! Angry with himself and his situation he yells "Curse you time! If you didn't exist I would have all the Time I need!" Time being a funny thing and not at all what everyone expects had just so happened to hear Lewis and the curse he laid upon Time's head and so decided to pay back in kind a curse of their own! Time sidled up to Lewis and whispered a curse in his ear!

With a Jump and a start! Lewis leaps and turns about to find no one there, not a soul and puts it down to the migraine induced hallucinations.

With his wits rattled Lewis forgets about his date and goes home to rest his pounding head.   To keep the story short and as not to annoy Time for wasting it! Lewis realizes his day is ever repeating! 

Doomed to relive the same day over and over again for eternity unless he can break the curse, he uses his time to find out what the "Hidden Verse" is and where it can be found. Days, Months or even Years might have passed but Lewis finally finds a clue to the whereabouts of the "Hidden Verse", it is found in the Chrononomicron the fabled and mythical "Book of Time", but all tales told and leads followed say that the book was dismembered in ages past.

With this new knowledge at hand Lewis Caroll sets out on an adventure which will span unknown ages in but a single day to find the parts needed to put the Book back together and read the "Hidden Verse" which will break the Curse!

Controls:
Mouse Driven Navigation
R: Respawns player
ESC: Pause Menu (option to Main Menu from Pause)

Made in UE5 for the "Senscape Adventurous Game Jam" 2022
